name: UFED Report
summary: A UFDR file is a report created by Cellebrite Physical Analyzer, a digital forensics application. It contains a summary of data extracted from a smartphone or other device(s). Digital forensics investigators create UFDR files and share them with other law enforcement professionals as part of criminal investigations and prosecutions. UFDR files can be opened with Cellebrite Reader.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
